cs211.labs.cgui
Class PadLayout

java.lang.Object
  cs211.labs.cgui.PadLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager
public class PadLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager

largely based on http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/layout/custom.html Need to include logic to take into account animation in motion. currently layout manager tramples on top of animation motion every time its called. It appears that layoutContainer is called on mouse Enter events

Author:
rlum

Specified by:
addLayoutComponent in interface java.awt.LayoutManager

layoutContainer

public void layoutContainer(java.awt.Container parent)
this is the key method that determines where components go and their sizing. First half attempts to set container size based on keys taking their natural sizes. Second half compares the results of the fit and recalculates if the gap is bigger than fudge. It resorts to resizing components to fit within the container size that the layout manager allows

Specified by:
layoutContainer in interface java.awt.LayoutManager
